title.narrative: New opportunities are unlocked for women to benefit from Rwanda’s expanding private sector markets

description.narrative: Related national priorities as defined in the National Strategy for Transformation 2017 - 2024 (NST1) Economic Transformation Pillar: - Priority Area 1: Create 1,500,000 decent and productive jobs for economic development. - Priority Area 3: Establish Rwanda as a Globally Competitive Knowledge-based Economy - Priority Area 5: Increase domestic savings and position Rwanda as a hub for financial services to promote investments

description.narrative: The large number of women who were supported so far are mainly those involved in small and medium businesses. In the next SN, UN Women and its implementing partners target women owning small, medium enterprises but also large enterprises.
